 DzParentProductContainer (QString name, DzAbstractAssetContainer *owner=NULL)

Detailed Description

Class for containing parent product assets.

This class is used to contain all assets related to a parent product

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

bool DzParentProductContainer::insertChildContainer ( DzAbstractAssetContainer *  container  )  [virtual, slot]

Attempts to insert container as a child of this container. If container already has an owner then this method will not add the child and return false.

Parameters:
container The container to add as a child. It cannot already have an owner
Returns:
true if container was successfully inserted, false otherwise

Implements DzAbstractAssetContainer.
